lines.text: They have destroyed my servant. They will be destroyed...

[screaming at Alice]
I have no further use for you!
Who are you? How d'you know my name?

[Commenting on Jeremy Secker's arrest for murder]
Son hates his father, he's hot-blooded, they quarrel and the son loses his temper. Anyway we've got him all locked up now, safe and sound.
But Jeremy did not hate his father. He was the most even-tempered...
If you came here to obstruct justice...
I came here because you sent for me!

[to Alice]
I haven't beaten you since you were a little girl.
Oh Alice, what are you wearing to the Allens' party on Friday?
Oh good. That won't clash with my blue.
Oh Jeremy, what are you wearing?
Oh, ripping! Won't clash with my yellow!
Run Alice run as fast as you can away from here!
Not without you Paul he will kill you he will kill both of us!
